description: 认证应用通用工具函数（模型配置提示等）

replacements.`Default model set to ${model} for agent: `默认模型已设置为 ${model}，用于智能体 "${params.agentId}"。`
replacements.message: \"How do you want to provide th: message: "你想如何提供此 API 密钥？"
replacements.label: \"Paste API key now\": label: "直接粘贴 API 密钥"
replacements.hint: \"Stores the key directly in OpenC: hint: "将密钥直接存储在 OpenClaw 配置中"
replacements.hint: \"Stores a reference to env or con: hint: "存储对环境变量或已配置的外部密钥提供商的引用"
replacements.message: \"Where is this API key stored?: message: "此 API 密钥存储在哪里？"
replacements.hint: \"Reference a variable from your r: hint: "引用运行时环境中的变量"
replacements.hint: \"Use a configured file or exec se: hint: "使用已配置的文件或 exec 密钥提供商"
replacements.\"No file/exec secret providers are conf: "尚未配置文件/exec 密钥提供商。请在 secrets.providers 下添加，或选择环境变量。"
